subtitleNullable: A compilation of best-selling individual books and book series
descriptionNullable: The “Best-Selling Books” dataset compiles information on top-selling individual books and book series from various genres and languages. Sales estimates are based on copies sold worldwide, with data available primarily from the 1990s onward in Western nations. Notable entries include religious texts like the Bible and the Qur’an, as well as non-religious works such as the “Quotations from Chairman Mao Tse-tung” (commonly known as the Little Red Book).
title: List of best selling books
subtitle: A compilation of best-selling individual books and book series
description: The “Best-Selling Books” dataset compiles information on top-selling individual books and book series from various genres and languages. Sales estimates are based on copies sold worldwide, with data available primarily from the 1990s onward in Western nations. Notable entries include religious texts like the Bible and the Qur’an, as well as non-religious works such as the “Quotations from Chairman Mao Tse-tung” (commonly known as the Little Red Book).
